main event: A UFO sighting was reported on October 31, 1965, in Chicago, Illinois, involving a civilian observer.
interesting points: The observer described the object as large, approximately 40 to 50 feet in diameter, and hovering about 50 feet above ground., The object emitted a diffuse bright light that illuminated the surroundings., The sighting lasted for a total of 5 minutes., The observer indicated that the object was not a conventional aircraft., The case was referred to Project Blue Book for further investigation.
sighted object: a large, bright light emitting object
witness description: A 37-year-old female, who had experience as an aircraft enthusiast
